structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: For the purpose of acquiring, creating and maintaining collection systems and solid waste management facilities any waste management district may pursuant to the provisions of KRS Chapter 58 borrow money and issue negotiable revenue bonds.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 17.
